https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qG315cYJtlpbUtdITbX9GzX2xGw.jpg Freely inspired by the poem Hierarquia (1970), by Pier Paolo Pasolini, which launches his vision of Brazil at that time, the film takes up and confronts the hybrid reality of a convulsed country, its dramatic tensions, based on radical experiences.
